Question 80) The vaccine revolt (1904) clearly showed the defensive, disorganized, fragmented aspect of popular action. The state was not denying, there was no participation in political decisions; values ​​and rights considered above state intervention were advocated.
CARVALHO, J. M. The bestialized: Rio de Janeiro and the Republic The mobilization analyzed represented a warning, as the popular action questioned
A) The high price.
B) the clientelist policy.
C) urban reforms.
D) the government will.
E) electoral practices.
